mapper.sql: T.ID AS "id", T.CREATE_DATE AS "createDate", T.CREATE_USER AS "createUser", T.UPDATE_DATE AS "updateDate", T.UPDATE_USER AS "updateUser", T.REMARKS AS "remarks", T.DEL_FLAG AS "delFlag", T.NAME AS "name", T.BIRTHDAY AS "birthday", T.SEX AS "sex", T.DESCRIBE AS "describe", T.ISDEL AS "isdel"

sql.where:
1=1
AND T.ID LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%'
AND T.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate}
AND T.CREATE_USER LIKE '%'||#{createUser}||'%'
AND T.UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate}
AND T.UPDATE_USER LIKE '%'||#{updateUser}||'%'
AND T.REMARKS LIKE '%'||#{remarks}||'%'
AND T.DEL_FLAG LIKE '%'||#{delFlag}||'%'
AND T.NAME LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%'
AND T.BIRTHDAY = #{birthday}
AND T.SEX LIKE '%'||#{sex}||'%'
AND T.ISDEL LIKE '%'||#{isdel}||'%'

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) total FROM T_TEST_W T
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T_TEST_W (
REMARKS, DEL_FLAG, NAME, BIRTHDAY, SEX, DESCRIBE, ISDEL, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, ID ) VALUES (
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{isdel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser.userName}, sysdate, #{id} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_TEST_W
REMARKS=#{remarks},
DEL_FLAG=#{delFlag},
NAME=#{name},
BIRTHDAY=#{birthday},
SEX=#{sex},
DESCRIBE=#{describe},
ISDEL=#{isdel},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser.userName}, UPDATE_DATE = sysdate, ID = #{id}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM T_TEST_W WHERE id IN
#{listId}
